mb.web
Class WebThreadRemoteClient

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      mb.web.WebThread
          mb.web.WebThreadClient
              mb.web.WebThreadRemoteClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class WebThreadRemoteClient
extends WebThreadClient

Client-side of the Tic Tac Toe application. Using given coordinates and credentials, it tries to connect and log in to server. If the credentials are incorrect, it exits immediately.

Author:
mb
